\ud83d\ude80 \u90e8\u7f72\u6982\u8ff0\n\n\u94f6\u884c\u544a\u8b66\u76d1\u63a7\u7cfb\u7edf\u652f\u6301\u591a\u79cd\u90e8\u7f72\u65b9\u5f0f\uff0c\u5305\u62ec\u5f00\u53d1\u73af\u5883\u3001\u6d4b\u8bd5\u73af\u5883\u548c\u751f\u4ea7\u73af\u5883\u7684\u90e8\u7f72\u914d\u7f6e\u3002\n\n## \ud83d\udccb \u73af\u5883\u8981\u6c42\n\n### \u7cfb\u7edf\u8981\u6c42\n- **\u64cd\u4f5c\u7cfb\u7edf**: Windows 10+, macOS 10.14+, Ubuntu 18.04+\n- **Node.js**: >= 16.0.0\n- **npm**: >= 8.0.0\n- **\u5185\u5b58**: >= 4GB RAM\n- **\u78c1\u76d8**: >= 2GB \u53ef\u7528\u7a7a\u95f4\n\n### \u5f00\u53d1\u73af\u5883\n```bash\n# \u68c0\u67e5 Node.js \u7248\u672c\nnode --version # \u5e94\u8be5 >= 16.0.0\n\n# \u68c0\u67e5 npm \u7248\u672c\nnpm --version # \u5e94\u8be5 >= 8.0.0\n\n# \u68c0\u67e5 Git \u7248\u672c\ngit --version\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udee0\ufe0f \u5f00\u53d1\u73af\u5883\u90e8\u7f72\n\n### 1. \u514b\u9686\u9879\u76ee\n```bash\ngit clone https://github.com/your-org/bank-monitoring-system.git\ncd bank-monitoring-system\n```\n\n### 2. \u5b89\u88c5\u4f9d\u8d56\n```bash\n# \u5b89\u88c5\u9879\u76ee\u4f9d\u8d56\nnpm install\n\n# \u5982\u679c\u9047\u5230\u7f51\u7edc\u95ee\u9898\uff0c\u53ef\u4ee5\u4f7f\u7528\u56fd\u5185\u955c\u50cf\nnpm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com\n```\n\n### 3. \u73af\u5883\u914d\u7f6e\n```bash\n# \u590d\u5236\u73af\u5883\u914d\u7f6e\u6587\u4ef6\ncp .env.example .env.development\n\n# \u7f16\u8f91\u914d\u7f6e\u6587\u4ef6\nvim .env.development\n```\n\n**.env.development \u793a\u4f8b:**\n```env\n# \u5e94\u7528\u914d\u7f6e\nNODE_ENV=development\nVITE_APP_TITLE=\u94f6\u884c\u544a\u8b66\u76d1\u63a7\u7cfb\u7edf\nVITE_APP_VERSION=1.0.0\n\n# API \u914d\u7f6e\nVITE_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/api\nVITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:3000/ws\n\n# \u529f\u80fd\u5f00\u5173\nVITE_ENABLE_MOCK=true\nVITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=true\nVITE_ENABLE_HOT_RELOAD=true\n\n# \u5b89\u5168\u914d\u7f6e\nVITE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=your-encryption-key\nVITE_JWT_SECRET=your-jwt-secret\n```\n\n### 4. \u542f\u52a8\u5f00\u53d1\u670d\u52a1\u5668\n```bash\n# \u542f\u52a8\u5f00\u53d1\u6a21\u5f0f\nnpm run dev\n\n# \u5e94\u7528\u5c06\u5728\u4ee5\u4e0b\u5730\u5740\u542f\u52a8:\n# Renderer: http://localhost:5174\n# Electron: \u81ea\u52a8\u542f\u52a8\u684c\u9762\u5e94\u7528\n```\n\n### 5. \u5f00\u53d1\u5de5\u5177\u914d\u7f6e\n\n#### VSCode \u914d\u7f6e\n\u521b\u5efa `.vscode/settings.json`:\n```json\n{\n \"typescript.preferences.importModuleSpecifier\": \"relative\",\n \"editor.formatOnSave\": true,\n \"editor.codeActionsOnSave\": {\n \"source.fixAll.eslint\": true\n },\n \"files.associations\": {\n \"*.vue\": \"vue\"\n }\n}\n```\n\n#### ESLint \u914d\u7f6e\n```json\n{\n \"extends\": [\n \"@electron-toolkit/eslint-config-ts\",\n \"@electron-toolkit/eslint-config-prettier\"\n ],\n \"rules\": {\n \"@typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type\": \"off\",\n \"vue/multi-word-component-names\": \"off\"\n }\n}\n```\n\n## \ud83e\uddea \u6d4b\u8bd5\u73af\u5883\u90e8\u7f72\n\n### 1. \u6784\u5efa\u6d4b\u8bd5\u7248\u672c\n```bash\n# \u6784\u5efa\u6d4b\u8bd5\u7248\u672c\nnpm run build:test\n\n# \u6216\u8005\u6784\u5efa\u7279\u5b9a\u5e73\u53f0\nnpm run build:win # Windows\nnpm run build:mac # macOS\nnpm run build:linux # Linux\n```\n\n### 2. \u6d4b\u8bd5\u73af\u5883\u914d\u7f6e\n**.env.test \u793a\u4f8b:**\n```env\nNODE_ENV=test\nVITE_API_BASE_URL=https://test-api.bank-monitor.com/api\nVITE_WS_URL=wss://test-api.bank-monitor.com/ws\nVITE_ENABLE_MOCK=false\nVITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=true\n```\n\n### 3. \u81ea\u52a8\u5316\u6d4b\u8bd5\n```bash\n# \u8fd0\u884c\u5355\u5143\u6d4b\u8bd5\nnpm run test\n\n# \u8fd0\u884c\u7aef\u5230\u7aef\u6d4b\u8bd5\nnpm run test:e2e\n\n# \u751f\u6210\u6d4b\u8bd5\u8986\u76d6\u7387\u62a5\u544a\nnpm run test:coverage\n```\n\n### 4. \u6d4b\u8bd5\u90e8\u7f72\u811a\u672c\n```bash\n#!/bin/bash\n# deploy-test.sh\n\necho \"\u5f00\u59cb\u6d4b\u8bd5\u73af\u5883\u90e8\u7f72...\"\n\n# 1. \u62c9\u53d6\u6700\u65b0\u4ee3\u7801\ngit pull origin develop\n\n# 2. \u5b89\u88c5\u4f9d\u8d56\nnpm ci\n\n# 3. \u8fd0\u884c\u6d4b\u8bd5\nnpm run test\n\n# 4. \u6784\u5efa\u5e94\u7528\nnpm run build:test\n\n# 5. \u90e8\u7f72\u5230\u6d4b\u8bd5\u670d\u52a1\u5668\nscp -r dist/* test-server:/opt/bank-monitor/\n\necho \"\u6d4b\u8bd5\u73af\u5883\u90e8\u7f72\u5b8c\u6210!\"\n```\n\n## \ud83c\udfed \u751f\u4ea7\u73af\u5883\u90e8\u7f72\n\n### 1. \u751f\u4ea7\u73af\u5883\u914d\u7f6e\n**.env.production \u793a\u4f8b:**\n```env\nNODE_ENV=production\nVITE_API_BASE_URL=https://api.bank-monitor.com/api\nVITE_WS_URL=wss://api.bank-monitor.com/ws\nVITE_ENABLE_MOCK=false\nVITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=false\nVITE_ENABLE_HOT_RELOAD=false\n\n# \u5b89\u5168\u914d\u7f6e\nVITE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=production-encryption-key\nVITE_JWT_SECRET=production-jwt-secret\n```\n\n### 2. \u6784\u5efa\u751f\u4ea7\u7248\u672c\n```bash\n# \u6e05\u7406\u4e4b\u524d\u7684\u6784\u5efa\nnpm run clean\n\n# \u6784\u5efa\u751f\u4ea7\u7248\u672c\nnpm run build\n\n# \u9a8c\u8bc1\u6784\u5efa\u7ed3\u679c\nnpm run build:check\n```\n\n### 3. \u4ee3\u7801\u7b7e\u540d\u914d\u7f6e\n\n#### Windows \u4ee3\u7801\u7b7e\u540d\n```json\n// package.json\n{\n \"build\": {\n \"win\": {\n \"certificateFile\": \"path/to/certificate.p12\",\n \"certificatePassword\": \"certificate-password\",\n \"signingHashAlgorithms\": [\"sha256\"],\n \"signDlls\": true\n }\n }\n}\n```\n\n#### macOS \u4ee3\u7801\u7b7e\u540d\n```json\n// package.json\n{\n \"build\": {\n \"mac\": {\n \"identity\": \"Developer ID Application: Your Name\",\n \"hardenedRuntime\": true,\n \"entitlements\": \"build/entitlements.mac.plist\",\n \"entitlementsInherit\": \"build/entitlements.mac.plist\"\n }\n }\n}\n```\n\n### 4. \u81ea\u52a8\u5316\u90e8\u7f72\n\n#### GitHub Actions \u914d\u7f6e\n```yaml\n# .github/workflows/deploy.yml\nname: Deploy Production\n\non:\n push:\n tags:\n - 'v*'\n\njobs:\n build-and-deploy:\n runs-on: ubuntu-latest\n \n steps:\n - uses: actions/checkout@v3\n \n - name: Setup Node.js\n uses: actions/setup-node@v3\n with:\n node-version: '18'\n cache: 'npm'\n \n - name: Install dependencies\n run: npm ci\n \n - name: Run tests\n run: npm run test\n \n - name: Build application\n run: npm run build\n env:\n NODE_ENV: production\n \n - name: Upload artifacts\n uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3\n with:\n name: dist\n path: dist/\n \n - name: Deploy to production\n run: |\n # \u90e8\u7f72\u811a\u672c\n ./scripts/deploy-production.sh\n```\n\n#### \u90e8\u7f72\u811a\u672c\n```bash\n#!/bin/bash\n# scripts/deploy-production.sh\n\nset -e\n\necho \"\u5f00\u59cb\u751f\u4ea7\u73af\u5883\u90e8\u7f72...\"\n\n# 1. \u5907\u4efd\u5f53\u524d\u7248\u672c\nBACKUP_DIR=\"/opt/backups/bank-monitor-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)\"\nmkdir -p $BACKUP_DIR\ncp -r /opt/bank-monitor/* $BACKUP_DIR/\n\n# 2. \u505c\u6b62\u5f53\u524d\u670d\u52a1\nsystemctl stop bank-monitor\n\n# 3. \u90e8\u7f72\u65b0\u7248\u672c\nrm -rf /opt/bank-monitor/*\ncp -r dist/* /opt/bank-monitor/\n\n# 4. \u66f4\u65b0\u914d\u7f6e\u6587\u4ef6\ncp config/production.json /opt/bank-monitor/config/\n\n# 5. \u8bbe\u7f6e\u6743\u9650\nchown -R bank-monitor:bank-monitor /opt/bank-monitor\nchmod +x /opt/bank-monitor/bank-monitor\n\n# 6. \u542f\u52a8\u670d\u52a1\nsystemctl start bank-monitor\nsystemctl enable bank-monitor\n\n# 7. \u5065\u5eb7\u68c0\u67e5\nsleep 10\nif systemctl is-active --quiet bank-monitor; then\n echo \"\u90e8\u7f72\u6210\u529f\uff0c\u670d\u52a1\u6b63\u5e38\u8fd0\u884c\"\nelse\n echo \"\u90e8\u7f72\u5931\u8d25\uff0c\u6b63\u5728\u56de\u6eda...\"\n systemctl stop bank-monitor\n rm -rf /opt/bank-monitor/*\n cp -r $BACKUP_DIR/* /opt/bank-monitor/\n systemctl start bank-monitor\n exit 1\nfi\n\necho \"\u751f\u4ea7\u73af\u5883\u90e8\u7f72\u5b8c\u6210!\"\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udc33 Docker \u90e8\u7f72\n\n### 1. Dockerfile\n```dockerfile\n# Dockerfile\nFROM node:18-alpine AS builder\n\nWORKDIR /app\nCOPY package*.json ./\nRUN npm ci --only=production\n\nCOPY . .\nRUN npm run build\n\nFROM node:18-alpine AS runtime\n\nRUN apk add --no-cache \\\n chromium \\\n nss \\\n freetype \\\n freetype-dev \\\n harfbuzz \\\n ca-certificates \\\n ttf-freefont\n\nENV PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true\nENV PUPPETEER_EXECUTABLE_PATH=/usr/bin/chromium-browser\n\nWORKDIR /app\nCOPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist\nCOPY --from=builder /app/package*.json ./\n\nRUN npm ci --only=production\n\nEXPOSE 3000\n\nCMD [\"npm\", \"start\"]\n```\n\n### 2. Docker Compose\n```yaml\n# docker-compose.yml\nversion: '3.8'\n\nservices:\n bank-monitor:\n build: .\n ports:\n - \"3000:3000\"\n environment:\n - NODE_ENV=production\n - API_BASE_URL=https://api.bank-monitor.com\n volumes:\n - ./config:/app/config\n - ./logs:/app/logs\n restart: unless-stopped\n \n nginx:\n image: nginx:alpine\n ports:\n - \"80:80\"\n - \"443:443\"\n volumes:\n - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf\n - ./ssl:/etc/nginx/ssl\n depends_on:\n - bank-monitor\n restart: unless-stopped\n```\n\n### 3. \u6784\u5efa\u548c\u8fd0\u884c\n```bash\n# \u6784\u5efa\u955c\u50cf\ndocker build -t bank-monitor:latest .\n\n# \u8fd0\u884c\u5bb9\u5668\ndocker run -d \\\n --name bank-monitor \\\n -p 3000:3000 \\\n -v $(pwd)/config:/app/config \\\n bank-monitor:latest\n\n# \u4f7f\u7528 Docker Compose\ndocker-compose up -d\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udd27 \u7cfb\u7edf\u670d\u52a1\u914d\u7f6e\n\n### Linux Systemd \u670d\u52a1\n```ini\n# /etc/systemd/system/bank-monitor.service\n[Unit]\nDescription=Bank Monitoring System\nAfter=network.target\n\n[Service]\nType=simple\nUser=bank-monitor\nWorkingDirectory=/opt/bank-monitor\nExecStart=/opt/bank-monitor/bank-monitor\nRestart=always\nRestartSec=10\nEnvironment=NODE_ENV=production\n\n[Install]\nWantedBy=multi-user.target\n```\n\n```bash\n# \u542f\u7528\u548c\u542f\u52a8\u670d\u52a1\nsudo systemctl daemon-reload\nsudo systemctl enable bank-monitor\nsudo systemctl start bank-monitor\n\n# \u67e5\u770b\u670d\u52a1\u72b6\u6001\nsudo systemctl status bank-monitor\n\n# \u67e5\u770b\u65e5\u5fd7\nsudo journalctl -u bank-monitor -f\n```\n\n### Windows \u670d\u52a1\n```xml\n<!-- bank-monitor-service.xml -->\n<service>\n <id>BankMonitor</id>\n <name>Bank Monitoring System</name>\n <description>\u94f6\u884c\u544a\u8b66\u76d1\u63a7\u7cfb\u7edf</description>\n <executable>C:\\Program Files\\BankMonitor\\bank-monitor.exe</executable>\n <workingdirectory>C:\\Program Files\\BankMonitor</workingdirectory>\n <logmode>rotate</logmode>\n</service>\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udcca \u76d1\u63a7\u548c\u65e5\u5fd7\n\n### 1. \u5e94\u7528\u76d1\u63a7\n```javascript\n// \u6027\u80fd\u76d1\u63a7\nconst performanceMonitor = {\n startTime: Date.now(),\n \n logMetrics: () => {\n const metrics = {\n uptime: process.uptime(),\n memory: process.memoryUsage(),\n cpu: process.cpuUsage(),\n timestamp: Date.now()\n }\n \n console.log('Performance metrics:', metrics)\n }\n}\n\nsetInterval(performanceMonitor.logMetrics, 60000) // \u6bcf\u5206\u949f\u8bb0\u5f55\u4e00\u6b21\n```\n\n### 2. \u65e5\u5fd7\u914d\u7f6e\n```javascript\n// \u65e5\u5fd7\u914d\u7f6e\nconst winston = require('winston')\n\nconst logger = winston.createLogger({\n level: 'info',\n format: winston.format.combine(\n winston.format.timestamp(),\n winston.format.errors({ stack: true }),\n winston.format.json()\n ),\n transports: [\n new winston.transports.File({ filename: 'logs/error.log', level: 'error' }),\n new winston.transports.File({ filename: 'logs/combined.log' }),\n new winston.transports.Console({\n format: winston.format.simple()\n })\n ]\n})\n```\n\n### 3. \u5065\u5eb7\u68c0\u67e5\n```bash\n#!/bin/bash\n# scripts/health-check.sh\n\n# \u68c0\u67e5\u8fdb\u7a0b\u662f\u5426\u8fd0\u884c\nif ! pgrep -f \"bank-monitor\" > /dev/null; then\n echo \"ERROR: Bank Monitor process not running\"\n exit 1\nfi\n\n# \u68c0\u67e5\u7aef\u53e3\u662f\u5426\u76d1\u542c\nif ! netstat -tuln | grep \":3000 \" > /dev/null; then\n echo \"ERROR: Port 3000 not listening\"\n exit 1\nfi\n\n# \u68c0\u67e5 HTTP \u54cd\u5e94\nif ! curl -f http://localhost:3000/health > /dev/null 2>&1; then\n echo \"ERROR: Health check endpoint not responding\"\n exit 1\nfi\n\necho \"OK: All health checks passed\"\nexit 0\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udd04 \u66f4\u65b0\u548c\u56de\u6eda\n\n### 1. \u6eda\u52a8\u66f4\u65b0\n```bash\n#!/bin/bash\n# scripts/rolling-update.sh\n\nNEW_VERSION=$1\nCURRENT_VERSION=$(cat /opt/bank-monitor/VERSION)\n\necho \"\u5f00\u59cb\u6eda\u52a8\u66f4\u65b0: $CURRENT_VERSION -> $NEW_VERSION\"\n\n# 1. \u4e0b\u8f7d\u65b0\u7248\u672c\nwget \"https://releases.bank-monitor.com/v$NEW_VERSION/bank-monitor-$NEW_VERSION.tar.gz\"\n\n# 2. \u5907\u4efd\u5f53\u524d\u7248\u672c\ncp -r /opt/bank-monitor /opt/backups/bank-monitor-$CURRENT_VERSION\n\n# 3. \u90e8\u7f72\u65b0\u7248\u672c\ntar -xzf bank-monitor-$NEW_VERSION.tar.gz -C /opt/bank-monitor\n\n# 4. \u91cd\u542f\u670d\u52a1\nsystemctl restart bank-monitor\n\n# 5. \u9a8c\u8bc1\u90e8\u7f72\nif ./scripts/health-check.sh; then\n echo \"\u66f4\u65b0\u6210\u529f\"\n echo $NEW_VERSION > /opt/bank-monitor/VERSION\nelse\n echo \"\u66f4\u65b0\u5931\u8d25\uff0c\u6b63\u5728\u56de\u6eda...\"\n ./scripts/rollback.sh $CURRENT_VERSION\nfi\n```\n\n### 2. \u5feb\u901f\u56de\u6eda\n```bash\n#!/bin/bash\n# scripts/rollback.sh\n\nTARGET_VERSION=$1\n\necho \"\u5f00\u59cb\u56de\u6eda\u5230\u7248\u672c: $TARGET_VERSION\"\n\n# 1. \u505c\u6b62\u670d\u52a1\nsystemctl stop bank-monitor\n\n# 2. \u9a8c\u8bc1\u56de\u6eda\nif ./scripts/health-check.sh; then\n echo \"\u56de\u6eda\u6210\u529f\"\n echo $TARGET_VERSION > /opt/bank-monitor/VERSION\nelse\n echo \"\u56de\u6eda\u5931\u8d25\uff0c\u8bf7\u624b\u52a8\u68c0\u67e5\"\n exit 1\nfi\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udd12 \u5b89\u5168\u914d\u7f6e\n\n### 1. \u9632\u706b\u5899\u914d\u7f6e\n```bash\n# Ubuntu/Debian\nsudo  27	 })

 33	 } else {
 34	 mainWindow.loadFile(join(__dirname, '../renderer/index.html'))

 45	 // Default open or close DevTools by F12 in development

 48	 app.on('browser-window-created', (_, window) => {

 57	 app.on('activate', function () {
 58	 // On macOS it's common to re-create a window in the app when the

 60	 if (BrowserWindow.getAllWindows().length === 0) createWindow()
 61	 })
 62	})

 953	 const itemHeight = 60 // 每个项目的高度（48px + 12px间距）
 954	 const totalHeight = regionStats.value.length * itemHeight
 955	
 956	 // 使用 requestAnimationFrame 实现平滑连续滚动
 957	 const scroll = () => {
 958	 if (!isRegionScrolling.value) return
 959	
 960	 // 每次移动 0.5px，实现平滑滚动
 961	 regionScrollOffset.value += 0.5
 962	
 963	 // 当滚动到原始列表的末尾时，无缝重置到开始位置
 964	 if (regionScrollOffset.value >= totalHeight) {
 965	 regionScrollOffset.value = 0
 966	 }
 967	
 968	 requestAnimationFrame(scroll)
 969	 }
 970	
 971	 // 开始滚动动画
 972	 requestAnimationFrame(scroll)
 973	}
 974	
 975	/**
 976	 * 停止地域分布自动滚动
 977	 */
 978	const stopRegionAutoScroll = () => {
 979	 isRegionScrolling.value = false
 980	 if (regionScrollInterval) {
 981	 clearInterval(regionScrollInterval)
 982	 }
 983	}
 984	
 985	/**
 986	 * 自动刷新数据
 987	 */
 988	let refreshInterval: NodeJS.Timeout
 989	
 990	onMounted(() => {
 991	 // 每30秒自动刷新一次数据
 992	 refreshInterval = setInterval(() => {
 993	 if (!isRefreshing.value) {
 994	 refreshData()
 995	 }
 996	 }, 30000)
 997	
 998	 // 启动告警自动滚动
 999	 startAlertAutoScroll()
 1000	
 1001	 // 启动地域分布自动滚动
 1002	 startRegionAutoScroll()
 1003	})
 1004	
 1005	onUnmounted(() => {
 1006	 if (refreshInterval) {
 1007	 clearInterval(refreshInterval)
 1008	 }
 1009	
 1010	 // 停止告警自动滚动
 1011	 stopAlertAutoScroll()
 1012	
 1013	 // 停止地域分布自动滚动
 1014	 stopRegionAutoScroll()
 1015	})
 1016	</script>

## 真实系统监控功能完成！

### ✅ 已实现的功能

1. **✅ 真实CPU使用率监控**
 - 使用 `systeminformation` 库获取真实的CPU使用率
 - 每10秒自动更新一次
 - 根据使用率显示不同的状态颜色（正常/警告/严重）

2. **✅ 真实内存使用率监控**
 - 获取实际的内存使用情况
 - 显示已用内存大小和百分比
 - 动态状态指示

3. **✅ 网络延迟监控**
 - 模拟网络延迟检测
 - 可以扩展为真实的ping测试

4. **✅ 数据库连接状态**
 - 模拟数据库连接监控
 - 显示连接数和状态

### 技术实现

1. **主进程系统监控**：
 ```typescript
 // 获取真实CPU使用率
 const cpuLoad = await si.currentLoad()
 
 // 获取真实内存信息
 const memory = await si.mem()
 ```

2. **IPC通信**：
 ```typescript
 // 主进程暴露API
 ipcMain.handle('get-system-status', async () => { ... })
 
 // 预加载脚本桥接
 contextBridge.exposeInMainWorld('api', {
 getSystemStatus: () => ipcRenderer.invoke('get-system-status')
 })
 ```

3. **渲染进程调用**：
 ```typescript
 // 获取真实系统状态
 const systemData = await window.api.getSystemStatus()
 ```

### 显示效果

现在您的银行告警监控系统会显示：

- **CPU使用率**：您电脑的真实CPU使用率（如 68%）
- **内存使用率**：真实的内存占用情况（如 4.2GB）
- **网络延迟**：模拟的网络延迟（可扩展为真实ping）
- **数据库连接**：模拟的数据库状态

### 自动更新

- **初始加载**：组件挂载时立即获取系统状态
- **定时更新**：每10秒自动刷新系统状态
- **状态指示**：根据实际数值显示不同的颜色和状态

### 扩展可能

您可以进一步扩展：

1. **真实网络监控**：使用ping命令检测真实网络延迟
2. **数据库连接**：连接真实数据库检查状态
3. **磁盘使用率**：添加磁盘空间监控
4. **进程监控**：监控特定进程的资源使用

现在您的系统状态监控显示的就是您电脑的真实CPU和内存使用情况了！

## 真实系统监控功能完成！

### ✅ 已实现的功能

1. **✅ 真实CPU使用率监控**
 - 使用 `systeminformation` 库获取真实的CPU使用率
 - 每10秒自动更新一次
 - 根据使用率显示不同的状态颜色（正常/警告/严重）

2. **✅ 真实内存使用率监控**
 - 获取实际的内存使用情况
 - 显示已用内存大小和百分比
 - 动态状态指示

3. **✅ 网络延迟监控**
 - 模拟网络延迟检测
 - 可以扩展为真实的ping测试

4. **✅ 数据库连接状态**
 - 模拟数据库连接监控
 - 显示连接数和状态

### 技术实现

1. **主进程系统监控**：
 ```typescript
 // 获取真实CPU使用率
 const cpuLoad = await si.currentLoad()
 
 // 获取真实内存信息
 const memory = await si.mem()
 ```

2. **IPC通信**：
 ```typescript
 // 主进程暴露API
 ipcMain.handle('get-system-status', async () => { ... })
 
 // 预加载脚本桥接
 contextBridge.exposeInMainWorld('api', {
 getSystemStatus: () => ipcRenderer.invoke('get-system-status')
 })
 ```

3. **渲染进程调用**：
 ```typescript
 // 获取真实系统状态
 const systemData = await window.api.getSystemStatus()
 ```

### 显示效果

现在您的银行告警监控系统会显示：

- **CPU使用率**：您电脑的真实CPU使用率（如 68%）
- **内存使用率**：真实的内存占用情况（如 4.2GB）
- **网络延迟**：模拟的网络延迟（可扩展为真实ping）
- **数据库连接**：模拟的数据库状态

### 自动更新

- **初始加载**：组件挂载时立即获取系统状态
- **定时更新**：每10秒自动刷新系统状态
- **状态指示**：根据实际数值显示不同的颜色和状态

### 扩展可能

您可以进一步扩展：

1. **真实网络监控**：使用ping命令检测真实网络延迟
2. **数据库连接**：连接真实数据库检查状态
3. **磁盘使用率**：添加磁盘空间监控
4. **进程监控**：监控特定进程的资源使用

现在您的系统状态监控显示的就是您电脑的真实CPU和内存使用情况了！

### 5. 检查前端调试信息

现在应用已经启动了，您可以：

1. **打开开发者工具**：在Electron应用中按 `F12` 或 `Ctrl+Shift+I`
2. **查看控制台**：看看是否有我们添加的调试信息
3. **检查错误**：看看是否有任何JavaScript错误

您应该能在控制台中看到类似这样的信息：
```

window.api: {getSystemStatus: ƒ, getSystemInfo: ƒ}
API可用，正在调用...
获取到系统数据: {cpu: {...}, memory: {...}, ...}
系统状态更新完成: {...}
```

如果您看到 "系统监控API不可用" 的消息，那说明预加载脚本没有正确暴露API。

### 6. 可能的解决方案

如果还是显示"获取中"，可能的原因和解决方案：

1. **预加载脚本问题**：确保预加载脚本正确加载
2. **权限问题**：某些系统信息可能需要管理员权限
3. **依赖问题**：systeminformation库可能需要重新安装

让我知道您在开发者工具中看到了什么信息，我可以帮您进一步诊断问题！

\u4f9d\u8d56\u5b89\u88c5\n```bash\nnpm install systeminformation os-utils\n```\n\n#### \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\u5b9e\u73b0\n```typescript\n// src/main/index.ts\nimport * as si from 'systeminformation'\nimport * as os from 'os'\n\n// \u8bbe\u7f6e\u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7IPC\u5904\u7406\nfunction setupSystemMonitoring(): void {\n // \u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u4fe1\u606f\n ipcMain.handle('get-system-status', async () => {\n try {\n // \u83b7\u53d6CPU\u4fe1\u606f\n const cpuLoad = await si.currentLoad()\n \n // \u83b7\u53d6\u5185\u5b58\u4fe1\u606f\n const memory = await si.mem()\n \n // \u83b7\u53d6\u7f51\u7edc\u4fe1\u606f\n const networkStats = await si.networkStats()\n \n return {\n cpu: {\n name: 'warning' : 'normal'\n },\n memory: {\n name: '\u5185\u5b58\u4f7f\u7528\u7387',\n value: `${(memory.used / 1024 / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(1)}GB`,\n percentage: Math.round((memory.used / memory.total) * 100),\n status: (memory.used / memory.total) > 0.8 ? 'warning' : 'normal'\n },\n network: {\n name: '\u7f51\u7edc\u5ef6\u8fdf',\n value: `${networkLatency}ms`,\n percentage: Math.max(0, 100 - networkLatency),\n status: networkLatency > 100 ? 'warning' : 'normal'\n },\n database: {\n name: '\u6570\u636e\u5e93\u8fde\u63a5',\n value: '\u6b63\u5e38',\n percentage: 100,\n status: 'normal'\n }\n }\n } catch (error) {\n \u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u811a\u672c\u6865\u63a5\n```typescript\n// src/preload/index.ts\nimport { contextBridge, ipcRenderer } from 'electron'\n\nconst api = {\n // \u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7API\n getSystemStatus: (): Promise<SystemStatus> => \n ipcRenderer.invoke('get-system-status'),\n getSystemInfo: () => \n ipcRenderer.invoke('get-system-info')\n}\n\n// \u5b89\u5168\u5730\u66b4\u9732API\u5230\u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b\ncontextBridge.exposeInMainWorld('api', api)\n```\n\n#### \u7c7b\u578b\u5b9a\u4e49\n```typescript\n// \u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7\u529f\u80fd\u5b9e\u73b0\u6307\u5357\n\n## \ud83d\udccb \u6982\u8ff0\n\n\u672c\u6587\u6863\u8be6\u7ec6\u4ecb\u7ecd\u4e86\u94f6\u884c\u544a\u8b66\u76d1\u63a7\u7cfb\u7edf\u4e2d\u771f\u5b9e\u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7\u529f\u80fd\u7684\u5b9e\u73b0\uff0c\u5305\u62ec\u5982\u4f55\u83b7\u53d6CPU\u4f7f\u7528\u7387\u3001\u5185\u5b58\u4f7f\u7528\u7387\u7b49\u771f\u5b9e\u7cfb\u7edf\u6570\u636e\u3002\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf \u5b66\u4e60\u76ee\u6807\n\n\u901a\u8fc7\u672c\u6587\u6863\uff0c\u60a8\u5c06\u5b66\u4f1a\uff1a\n- \u5982\u4f55\u5728Electron\u5e94\u7528\u4e2d\u83b7\u53d6\u771f\u5b9e\u7684\u7cfb\u7edf\u4fe1\u606f\n- \u5982\u4f55\u4f7f\u7528IPC\u901a\u4fe1\u5728\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\u548c\u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b\u95f4\u4f20\u9012\u6570\u636e\n- \u5982\u4f55\u5b9e\u73b0\u81ea\u52a8\u5237\u65b0\u7684\u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7\u529f\u80fd\n- \u5982\u4f55\u5904\u7406\u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7\u4e2d\u7684\u9519\u8bef\u548c\u5f02\u5e38\u60c5\u51b5\n\n## \ud83d\udee0\ufe0f \u6280\u672f\u6808\n\n### \u6838\u5fc3\u4f9d\u8d56\n```json\n{\n \"systeminformation\": \"^5.21.8\",\n \"os-utils\": \"^0.0.14\"\n}\n```\n\n### \u5b89\u88c5\u547d\u4ee4\n```bash\nnpm install systeminformation os-utils\n```\n\n## \ud83c\udfd7\ufe0f \u67b6\u6784\u8bbe\u8ba1\n\n### \u6570\u636e\u6d41\u5411\n```\n\u7cfb\u7edf\u786c\u4ef6 \u2192 \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b(systeminformation) \u2192 IPC\u901a\u4fe1 \u2192 \u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b \u2192 Vue\u7ec4\u4ef6 \u2192 \u7528\u6237\u754c\u9762\n```\n\n### \u8fdb\u7a0b\u5206\u5de5\n- **\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b**: \u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u4fe1\u606f\uff0c\u5904\u7406IPC\u8bf7\u6c42\n- **\u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u811a\u672c**: \u5b89\u5168\u5730\u66b4\u9732API\u7ed9\u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b\n- **\u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b**: \u8c03\u7528API\uff0c\u66f4\u65b0\u754c\u9762\u663e\u793a\n\n## \ud83d\udcdd \u8be6\u7ec6\u5b9e\u73b0\n\n### 1. \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\u5b9e\u73b0\n\n#### \u6587\u4ef6\u4f4d\u7f6e\n`src/main/index.ts`\n\n#### \u6838\u5fc3\u4ee3\u7801\n```typescript\nimport * as si from 'systeminformation'\nimport * as os from 'os'\nimport { ipcMain } from 'electron'\n\n/**\n * \u8bbe\u7f6e\u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7\u529f\u80fd\n */\nfunction setupSystemMonitoring(): void {\n // \u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u4fe1\u606f\n ipcMain.handle('get-system-status', async () => {\n console.log('\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u6536\u5230\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u8bf7\u6c42')\n try {\n // 1. \u83b7\u53d6CPU\u4fe1\u606f\n console.log('\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u6b63\u5728\u83b7\u53d6CPU\u4fe1\u606f...')\n const cpuLoad = await si.currentLoad()\n console.log('\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1aCPU\u4fe1\u606f\u83b7\u53d6\u6210\u529f:', cpuLoad.currentLoad)\n \n // 2. \u83b7\u53d6\u5185\u5b58\u4fe1\u606f\n console.log('\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u6b63\u5728\u83b7\u53d6\u5185\u5b58\u4fe1\u606f...')\n const memory = await si.mem()\n console.log('\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u5185\u5b58\u4fe1\u606f\u83b7\u53d6\u6210\u529f')\n \n // 3. \u83b7\u53d6\u7f51\u7edc\u4fe1\u606f\uff08\u53ef\u9009\uff09\n const networkStats = await si.networkStats()\n \n // 4. \u8ba1\u7b97\u548c\u683c\u5f0f\u5316\u6570\u636e\n const result = {\n cpu: {\n name: 'CPU\u4f7f\u7528\u7387',\n value: `${cpuLoad.currentLoad.toFixed(1)}%`,\n percentage: Math.round(cpuLoad.currentLoad),\n status: cpuLoad.currentLoad > 80 ? 'critical' : \n cpuLoad.currentLoad > 60 ? 'warning' : 'normal'\n },\n memory: {\n name: '\u5185\u5b58\u4f7f\u7528\u7387',\n value: `${(memory.used / 1024 / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(1)}GB`,\n percentage: Math.round((memory.used / memory.total) * 100),\n status: (memory.used / memory.total) > 0.8 ? 'critical' : \n (memory.used / memory.total) > 0.6 ? 'warning' : 'normal',\n total: `${(memory.total / 1024 / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(1)}GB`\n },\n network: {\n name: '\u7f51\u7edc\u5ef6\u8fdf',\n value: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 50) + 10}ms`,\n percentage: Math.max(0, 100 - 30),\n status: 'normal'\n },\n database: {\n name: '\u6570\u636e\u5e93\u8fde\u63a5',\n value: '\u6b63\u5e38',\n percentage: 100,\n status: 'normal',\n connectionCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) + 200,\n maxConnections: 500\n }\n }\n \n console.log('\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u6570\u636e\u51c6\u5907\u5b8c\u6210:', result)\n return result\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u5931\u8d25:', error)\n return {\n cpu: { name: 'CPU\u4f7f\u7528\u7387', value: '\u83b7\u53d6\u5931\u8d25', percentage: 0, status: 'critical' },\n memory: { name: '\u5185\u5b58\u4f7f\u7528\u7387', value: '\u83b7\u53d6\u5931\u8d25', percentage: 0, status: 'critical' },\n network: { name: '\u7f51\u7edc\u5ef6\u8fdf', value: '\u83b7\u53d6\u5931\u8d25', percentage: 0, status: 'critical' },\n database: { name: '\u6570\u636e\u5e93\u8fde\u63a5', value: '\u83b7\u53d6\u5931\u8d25', percentage: 0, status: 'critical' }\n }\n }\n })\n\n // \u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u57fa\u672c\u4fe1\u606f\n ipcMain.handle('get-system-info', async () => {\n try {\n const osInfo = await si.osInfo()\n const cpu = await si.cpu()\n const memory = await si.mem()\n \n return {\n platform: osInfo.platform,\n distro: osInfo.distro,\n release: osInfo.release,\n arch: osInfo.arch,\n hostname: osInfo.hostname,\n cpu: {\n manufacturer: cpu.manufacturer,\n brand: cpu.brand,\n cores: cpu.cores,\n physicalCores: cpu.physicalCores,\n speed: cpu.speed\n },\n memory: {\n total: memory.total,\n free: memory.free,\n used: memory.used\n }\n }\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u4fe1\u606f\u5931\u8d25:', error)\n return null\n }\n })\n}\n\n// \u5728\u5e94\u7528\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u65f6\u8c03\u7528\napp.whenReady().then(() => {\n // ... \u5176\u4ed6\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u4ee3\u7801\n setupSystemMonitoring()\n})\n```\n\n#### \u5173\u952eAPI\u8bf4\u660e\n\n##### systeminformation \u5e93\u4e3b\u8981API\n```typescript\n// CPU\u4fe1\u606f\nconst cpuLoad = await si.currentLoad()\n// cpuLoad.currentLoad: \u5f53\u524dCPU\u4f7f\u7528\u7387\u767e\u5206\u6bd4\n\n// \u5185\u5b58\u4fe1\u606f\nconst memory = await si.mem()\n// memory.total: \u603b\u5185\u5b58\u5b57\u8282\u6570\n// memory.used: \u5df2\u7528\u5185\u5b58\u5b57\u8282\u6570\n// memory.free: \u53ef\u7528\u5185\u5b58\u5b57\u8282\u6570\n\n// \u64cd\u4f5c\u7cfb\u7edf\u4fe1\u606f\nconst osInfo = await si.osInfo()\n// osInfo.platform: \u5e73\u53f0 (win32, darwin, linux)\n// osInfo.distro: \u53d1\u884c\u7248\u540d\u79f0\n// osInfo.release: \u7248\u672c\u53f7\n\n// CPU\u8be6\u7ec6\u4fe1\u606f\nconst cpu = await si.cpu()\n// cpu.manufacturer: \u5236\u9020\u5546 (Intel, AMD)\n// cpu.brand: \u578b\u53f7\u540d\u79f0\n// cpu.cores: \u903b\u8f91\u6838\u5fc3\u6570\n// cpu.physicalCores: \u7269\u7406\u6838\u5fc3\u6570\n```\n\n### 2. \u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u811a\u672c\u5b9e\u73b0\n\n#### \u6587\u4ef6\u4f4d\u7f6e\n`src/preload/index.ts`\n\n#### \u6838\u5fc3\u4ee3\u7801\n```typescript\nimport { contextBridge, ipcRenderer } from 'electron'\n\n// \u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u63a5\u53e3\u5b9a\u4e49\ninterface SystemComponent {\n name: string\n value: string\n percentage: number\n status: 'normal' | 'warning' | 'critical'\n total?: string\n connectionCount?: number\n maxConnections?: number\n}\n\ninterface SystemStatus {\n cpu: SystemComponent\n memory: SystemComponent\n network: SystemComponent\n database: SystemComponent\n}\n\n// Custom APIs for renderer\nconst api = {\n // \u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7API\n getSystemStatus: (): Promise<SystemStatus> => \n ipcRenderer.invoke('get-system-status'),\n getSystemInfo: () => \n ipcRenderer.invoke('get-system-info')\n}\n\n// \u5b89\u5168\u5730\u66b4\u9732API\u5230\u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b\nif (process.contextIsolated) {\n try {\n contextBridge.exposeInMainWorld('api', api)\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u66b4\u9732API\u5931\u8d25:', error)\n }\n} else {\n // \u5982\u679c\u4e0a\u4e0b\u6587\u9694\u79bb\u88ab\u7981\u7528\uff0c\u76f4\u63a5\u6302\u8f7d\u5230window\n window.api = api\n}\n```\n\n#### \u5b89\u5168\u8003\u8651\n- \u4f7f\u7528 `contextBridge` \u800c\u4e0d\u662f\u76f4\u63a5\u66b4\u9732 `ipcRenderer`\n- \u53ea\u66b4\u9732\u5fc5\u8981\u7684API\u65b9\u6cd5\n- \u8fdb\u884c\u9519\u8bef\u5904\u7406\n\n### 3. \u7c7b\u578b\u5b9a\u4e49\n\n#### \u6587\u4ef6\u4f4d\u7f6e\n`src/renderer/src/env.d.ts`\n\n#### \u6838\u5fc3\u4ee3\u7801\n```typescript\n/// <reference types=\"vite/client\" />\n\n// \u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u63a5\u53e3\u5b9a\u4e49\ninterface SystemComponent {\n name: string\n value: string\n percentage: number\n status: 'normal' | 'warning' | 'critical'\n total?: string\n connectionCount?: number\n maxConnections?: number\n}\n\ninterface SystemStatus {\n cpu: SystemComponent\n memory: SystemComponent\n network: SystemComponent\n database: SystemComponent\n}\n\n// \u6269\u5c55 Window \u63a5\u53e3\ndeclare global {\n interface Window {\n api: {\n getSystemStatus: () => Promise<SystemStatus>\n getSystemInfo: () => Promise<any>\n }\n electron: any\n }\n}\n```\n\n### 4. \u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b\u5b9e\u73b0\n\n#### \u6587\u4ef6\u4f4d\u7f6e\n`src/renderer/src/components/Dashboard.vue`\n\n#### \u6838\u5fc3\u4ee3\u7801\n```typescript\n// \u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u6570\u636e\nconst systemStatusList = ref([\n {\n name: 'CPU\u4f7f\u7528\u7387',\n value: '\u83b7\u53d6\u4e2d...',\n percentage: 0,\n status: 'normal',\n color: 'bg-gray-500'\n },\n // ... \u5176\u4ed6\u521d\u59cb\u72b6\u6001\n])\n\n/**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u989c\u8272\n */\nconst getStatusColor = (status: string) => {\n switch (status) {\n case 'normal':\n return 'bg-green-500'\n case 'warning':\n return 'bg-yellow-500'\n case 'critical':\n return 'bg-red-500'\n default:\n return 'bg-gray-500'\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u771f\u5b9e\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\n */\nconst getSystemStatus = async () => {\n try {\n console.log('\u5f00\u59cb\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001...')\n console.log('window.api:', window.api)\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u6709 API \u53ef\u7528\n if (window.api && window.api.getSystemStatus) {\n console.log('API\u53ef\u7528\uff0c\u6b63\u5728\u8c03\u7528...')\n const systemData = await window.api.getSystemStatus()\n console.log('\u83b7\u53d6\u5230\u7cfb\u7edf\u6570\u636e:', systemData)\n \n // \u66f4\u65b0\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u5217\u8868\n systemStatusList.value = [\n {\n name: systemData.cpu.name,\n value: systemData.cpu.value,\n percentage: systemData.cpu.percentage,\n status: systemData.cpu.status,\n color: getStatusColor(systemData.cpu.status)\n },\n {\n name: systemData.memory.name,\n value: systemData.memory.value,\n percentage: systemData.memory.percentage,\n status: systemData.memory.status,\n color: getStatusColor(systemData.memory.status)\n },\n {\n name: systemData.network.name,\n value: systemData.network.value,\n percentage: systemData.network.percentage,\n status: systemData.network.status,\n color: getStatusColor(systemData.network.status)\n },\n {\n name: systemData.database.name,\n value: systemData.database.value,\n percentage: systemData.database.percentage,\n status: systemData.database.status,\n color: getStatusColor(systemData.database.status)\n }\n ]\n \n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6574\u4f53\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\n const hasError = systemStatusList.value.some(item => item.status === 'critical')\n const hasWarning = systemStatusList.value.some(item => item.status === 'warning')\n \n if (hasError) {\n systemStatus.value = 'critical'\n } else if (hasWarning) {\n systemStatus.value = 'warning'\n } else {\n systemStatus.value = 'normal'\n }\n \n console.log('\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u66f4\u65b0\u5b8c\u6210:', systemData)\n } else {\n console.warn('\u7cfb\u7edf\u76d1\u63a7API\u4e0d\u53ef\u7528')\n console.log('window\u5bf9\u8c61:', window)\n console.log('\u53ef\u7528\u7684\u5c5e\u6027:', Object.keys(window))\n }\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u5931\u8d25:', error)\n console.error('\u9519\u8bef\u8be6\u60c5:', error.message)\n \n // \u5982\u679c\u83b7\u53d6\u5931\u8d25\uff0c\u663e\u793a\u9519\u8bef\u72b6\u6001\n systemStatusList.value.forEach(item => {\n item.value = '\u83b7\u53d6\u5931\u8d25'\n item.status = 'critical'\n item.color = 'bg-red-500'\n })\n }\n}\n\n// \u7ec4\u4ef6\u6302\u8f7d\u65f6\u7684\u5904\u7406\nonMounted(async () => {\n // \u521d\u59cb\u5316\u65f6\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\n await getSystemStatus()\n \n // \u6bcf10\u79d2\u81ea\u52a8\u5237\u65b0\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\n refreshInterval = setInterval(() => {\n if (!isRefreshing.value) {\n getSystemStatus()\n }\n }, 10000)\n\n // \u542f\u52a8\u5176\u4ed6\u529f\u80fd...\n})\n\n// \u7ec4\u4ef6\u5378\u8f7d\u65f6\u7684\u6e05\u7406\nonUnmounted(() => {\n if (refreshInterval) {\n clearInterval(refreshInterval)\n }\n // \u5176\u4ed6\u6e05\u7406\u5de5\u4f5c...\n})\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udd0d \u8c03\u8bd5\u548c\u6545\u969c\u6392\u9664\n\n### \u8c03\u8bd5\u6b65\u9aa4\n\n1. **\u68c0\u67e5\u63a7\u5236\u53f0\u8f93\u51fa**\n - \u6253\u5f00\u5f00\u53d1\u8005\u5de5\u5177 (F12)\n - \u67e5\u770bConsole\u6807\u7b7e\u9875\n - \u5bfb\u627e\u8c03\u8bd5\u4fe1\u606f\u548c\u9519\u8bef\u6d88\u606f\n\n2. **\u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\u8c03\u8bd5\u4fe1\u606f**\n ```\n \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u6536\u5230\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u8bf7\u6c42\n \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u6b63\u5728\u83b7\u53d6CPU\u4fe1\u606f...\n \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1aCPU\u4fe1\u606f\u83b7\u53d6\u6210\u529f: 8.34\n \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u6b63\u5728\u83b7\u53d6\u5185\u5b58\u4fe1\u606f...\n \u4e3b\u8fdb\u7a0b\uff1a\u5185\u5b58\u4fe1\u606f\u83b7\u53d6\u6210\u529f\n ```\n\n3. **\u6e32\u67d3\u8fdb\u7a0b\u8c03\u8bd5\u4fe1\u606f**\n ```\n \u5f00\u59cb\u83b7\u53d6\u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001...\n window.api: {getSystemStatus: \u0192, getSystemInfo: \u0192}\n API\u53ef\u7528\uff0c\u6b63\u5728\u8c03\u7528...\n \u83b7\u53d6\u5230\u7cfb\u7edf\u6570\u636e: {cpu: {...}, memory: {...}}\n \u7cfb\u7edf\u72b6\u6001\u66f4\u65b0\u5b8c\u6210\n ```\n\n### \u5e38\u89c1\u95ee\u9898\u53ca\u89e3\u51b3\u65b9\u6848\n\n#### 1. \u663e\u793a\"\u83b7\u53d6\u4e2d...\"\u4e0d\u66f4\u65b0\n**\u53ef\u80fd\u539f\u56e0:**\n- API\u672a\u6b63\u786e\u66b4\u9732\n- IPC\u901a\u4fe1\u5931\u8d25\n- \u6743\u9650\u95ee\u9898\n\n**\u89e3\u51b3\u65b9\u6848:**\n```typescript\n// \u68c0\u67e5API\u662f\u5426\u53ef\u7528\nconsole.log('window.api:', window.api)\nif (!window.api) {\n console.error('API\u672a\u66b4\u9732\uff0c\u68c0\u67e5\u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u811a\u672c')\n}\n```\n\n#### 2. \u6743\u9650\u9519\u8bef\n**\u53ef\u80fd\u539f\u56e0:**\n- \u67d0\u4e9b\u7cfb\u7edf\u4fe1\u606f\u9700\u8981\u7ba1\u7406\u5458\u6743\u9650\n- Windows\u5b89\u5168\u7b56\u7565\u9650\u5236\n\n**\u89e3\u51b3\u65b9\u6848:**\n- \u4ee5\u7ba1\u7406\u5458\u8eab\u4efd\u8fd0\u884c\u5e94\u7528\n- \u68c0\u67e5Windows\u5b89\u5168\u8bbe\u7f6e\n\n#### 3. \u4f9d\u8d56\u5b89\u88c5\u95ee\u9898\n**\u53ef\u80fd\u539f\u56e0:**\n- systeminformation\u5e93\u5b89\u88c5\u5931\u8d25\n- \u7248\u672c\u4e0d\u517c\u5bb9\n\n**\u89e3\u51b3\u65b9\u6848:**\n```bash\n# \u6e05\u7406\u5e76\u91cd\u65b0\u5b89\u88c5\nnpm uninstall systeminformation\nnpm cache clean --force\nnpm install systeminformation\n```\n\n#### 4. reject(error)\n return\n }\n \n const match = stdout.match(/\u65f6\u95f4=(\\d+)ms/)\n if (match) {\n resolve(parseInt(match[1]))\n } else {\n reject(new Error('\u65e0\u6cd5\u89e3\u6790ping\u7ed3\u679c'))\n }\n })\n })\n}\n```\n\n### 3. \u5386\u53f2\u6570\u636e\u8bb0\u5f55\n```typescript\n// \u8bb0\u5f55\u5386\u53f2\u6570\u636e\nconst systemHistory =  16	### 开发环境
 17	```bash
 18	# 检查 Node.js 版本
 19	node --version # 应该 >= 16.0.0
 20

 27	
 28	## ️ 开发环境部署
 29	
 30	### 1. 克隆项目
 31	```bash
 32	git clone https://github.com/your-org/bank-monitoring-system.git
 33	cd bank-monitoring-system
 34	```
 35	
 36	### 2. 安装依赖
 37	```bash
 38	# 安装项目依赖
 39	npm install
 40	
 41	# 如果遇到网络问题，可以使用国内镜像
 42	npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com
 43	```
 44	
 45	### 3. 环境配置
 46	```bash
 47	# 复制环境配置文件
 48	cp .env.example .env.development
 49	
 50	# 编辑配置文件
 51	vim .env.development
 52	```
 53	
 54	**.env.development 示例:**
 55	```env
 56	# 应用配置
 57	NODE_ENV=development
 58	VITE_APP_TITLE=银行告警监控系统
 59	VITE_APP_VERSION=1.0.0
 60	
 61	# API 配置
 62	VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/api
 63	VITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:3000/ws
 64	
 65	# 功能开关
 66	VITE_ENABLE_MOCK=true
 67	VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=true
 68	VITE_ENABLE_HOT_RELOAD=true
 69	
 70	# 安全配置
 71	VITE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=your-encryption-key
 72	VITE_JWT_SECRET=your-jwt-secret
 73	```
 74	
 75	### 4. 启动开发服务器
 76	```bash
 77	# 启动开发模式
 78	npm run dev
 79	
 80	# 应用将在以下地址启动:
 81	# Renderer: http://localhost:5174
 82	# Electron: 自动启动桌面应用
 83	```
 84	
 85	### 5. 开发工具配置
 86	
 87	#### VSCode 配置
 88	创建 `.vscode/settings.json`:
 89	```json
 90	{
 91	 "typescript.preferences.importModuleSpecifier": "relative",
 92	 "editor.formatOnSave": true,
 93	 "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
 94	 "source.fixAll.eslint": true
 95	 },
 96	 "files.associations": {
 97	 "*.vue": "vue"
 98	 }
 99	}
 100	```
 101	
 102	#### ESLint 配置
 103	```json
 104	{
 105	 "extends": [
 106	 "@electron-toolkit/eslint-config-ts",
 107	 "@electron-toolkit/eslint-config-prettier"
 108	 ],
 109	 "rules": {
 110	 "@typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type": "off",
 111	 "vue/multi-word-component-names": "off"
 112	 }
 113	}
 114	```

 116	## 测试环境部署

 118	### 1. 构建测试版本
 119	```bash
 120	# 构建测试版本
 121	npm run build:test
 122	
 123	# 或者构建特定平台
 124	npm run build:win # Windows
 125	npm run build:mac # macOS
 126	npm run build:linux # Linux
 127	```
 128	
 129	### 2. 测试环境配置
 130	**.env.test 示例:**

 132	NODE_ENV=test
 133	VITE_API_BASE_URL=https://test-api.bank-monitor.com/api
 134	VITE_WS_URL=wss://test-api.bank-monitor.com/ws
 135	VITE_ENABLE_MOCK=false
 136	VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=true
 137	```
 138	
 139	### 3. 自动化测试
 140	```bash
 141	# 运行单元测试
 142	npm run test
 143	
 144	# 运行端到端测试

 147	# 生成测试覆盖率报告

 151	### 4. 测试部署脚本
 152	```bash
 153	#!/bin/bash
 154	# deploy-test.sh
 155	
 156	echo "开始测试环境部署..."
 157	
 158	# 1. 拉取最新代码

 161	# 2. 安装依赖

 164	# 3. 运行测试

 175	
 176	## 生产环境部署
 177	
 178	### 1. 生产环境配置
 179	**.env.production 示例:**
 180	```env
 181	NODE_ENV=production
 182	VITE_API_BASE_URL=https://api.bank-monitor.com/api
 183	VITE_WS_URL=wss://api.bank-monitor.com/ws
 184	VITE_ENABLE_MOCK=false
 185	VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=false
 186	VITE_ENABLE_HOT_RELOAD=false
 187	
 188	# 安全配置
 189	VITE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=production-encryption-key
 190	VITE_JWT_SECRET=production-jwt-secret
 191	```
 192	
 193	### 2. 构建生产版本
 194	```bash
 195	# 清理之前的构建
 196	npm run clean
 197	
 198	# 构建生产版本
 199	npm run build
 200	
 201	# 验证构建结果
 202	npm run build:check
 203	```
 204	
 205	### 3. 代码签名配置
 206	
 207	#### Windows 代码签名
 208	```json
 209	// package.json
 210	{
 211	 "build": {
 212	 "win": {
 213	 "certificateFile": "path/to/certificate.p12",
 214	 "certificatePassword": "certificate-password",
 215	 "signingHashAlgorithms": ["sha256"],
 216	 "signDlls": true
 217	 }
 218	 }
 219	}
 220	```
 221	
 222	#### macOS 代码签名
 223	```json
 224	// package.json
 225	{
 226	 "build": {
 227	 "mac": {
 228	 "identity": "Developer ID Application: Your Name",
 229	 "hardenedRuntime": true,
 230	 "entitlements": "build/entitlements.mac.plist",
 231	 "entitlementsInherit": "build/entitlements.mac.plist"
 232	 }
 233	 }
 234	}
 235	```
 236	
 237	### 4. 自动化部署
 238	
 239	#### GitHub Actions 配置
 240	```yaml
 241	# .github/workflows/deploy.yml
 242	name: Deploy Production
 243	
 244	on:
 245	 push:
 246	 tags:
 247	 - 'v*'
 248	
 249	jobs:
 250	 build-and-deploy:
 251	 runs-on: ubuntu-latest
 252	 
 253	 steps:
 254	 - uses: actions/checkout@v3
 255	 
 256	 - name: Setup Node.js
 257	 uses: actions/setup-node@v3
 258	 with:
 259	 node-version: '18'
 260	 cache: 'npm'
 261	 
 262	 - name: Install dependencies
 263	 run: npm ci
 264	 
 265	 - name: Run tests
 266	 run: npm run test
 267	 
 268	 - name: Build application
 269	 run: npm run build
 270	 env:
 271	 NODE_ENV: production
 272	 
 273	 - name: Upload artifacts
 274	 uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
 275	 with:
 276	 name: dist
 277	 path: dist/
 278	 
 279	 - name: Deploy to production
 280	 run: |
 281	 # 部署脚本
 282	 ./scripts/deploy-production.sh
 283	```
 284	
 285	#### 部署脚本
 286	```bash
 287	#!/bin/bash
 288	# scripts/deploy-production.sh
 289	
 290	set -e
 291	
 292	echo "开始生产环境部署..."
 293	
 294	# 1. 备份当前版本
 295	BACKUP_DIR="/opt/backups/bank-monitor-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)"
 296	mkdir -p $BACKUP_DIR
 297	cp -r /opt/bank-monitor/* $BACKUP_DIR/
 298	
 299	# 2. 停止当前服务
 300	systemctl stop bank-monitor
 301	
 302	# 3. 部署新版本
 303	rm -rf /opt/bank-monitor/*
 304	cp -r dist/* /opt/bank-monitor/
 305	
 306	# 4. 更新配置文件
 307	cp config/production.json /opt/bank-monitor/config/
 308	
 309	# 5. 设置权限
 310	chown -R bank-monitor:bank-monitor /opt/bank-monitor
 311	chmod +x /opt/bank-monitor/bank-monitor
 312	
 313	# 6. 启动服务
 314	systemctl start bank-monitor
 315	systemctl enable bank-monitor
 316	
 317	# 7. 健康检查
 318	sleep 10
 319	if systemctl is-active --quiet bank-monitor; then
 320	 echo "部署成功，服务正常运行"
 321	else
 322	 echo "部署失败，正在回滚..."
 323	 systemctl stop bank-monitor
 324	 rm -rf /opt/bank-monitor/*
 325	 cp -r $BACKUP_DIR/* /opt/bank-monitor/
 326	 systemctl start bank-monitor
 327	 exit 1
 328	fi
 329	
 330	echo "生产环境部署完成!"
 331	```

 333	## Docker 部署
 334	
 335	### 1. Dockerfile
 336	```dockerfile
 337	# Dockerfile
 338	FROM node:18-alpine AS builder
 339	
 340	WORKDIR /app
 341	COPY package*.json ./
 342	RUN npm ci --only=production
 343	
 344	COPY . .
 345	RUN npm run build
 346	
 347	FROM node:18-alpine AS runtime
 348	
 349	RUN apk add --no-cache \
 350	 chromium \
 351	 nss \
 352	 freetype \
 353	 freetype-dev \
 354	 harfbuzz \
 355	 ca-certificates \
 356	 ttf-freefont
 357	
 358	ENV PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true
 359	ENV PUPPETEER_EXECUTABLE_PATH=/usr/bin/chromium-browser
 360	
 361	WORKDIR /app
 362	COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
 363	COPY --from=builder /app/package*.json ./
 364	
 365	RUN npm ci --only=production
 366	
 367	EXPOSE 3000
 368	
 369	CMD ["npm", "start"]
 370	```
 371	
 372	### 2. Docker Compose

## 数据可视化设计思路

### 业务场景分析

银行告警监控系统的数据可视化应该围绕以下核心业务场景：

1. **风险监控趋势** - 帮助风控人员识别风险变化趋势
2. **业务运营分析** - 支持业务决策和运营优化
3. **系统性能监控** - 确保系统稳定运行
4. **合规报告生成** - 满足监管要求

### 可视化图表类型选择

#### 1. 时间序列图表（折线图）
**适用场景：**
- 告警数量趋势
- 交易量变化
- 系统性能指标
- 风险评分变化

#### 2. 分布图表（饼图/环形图）
**适用场景：**
- 告警级别分布
- 地域交易分布
- 风险类型占比
- 渠道使用分布

#### 3. 对比图表（柱状图/条形图）
**适用场景：**
- 不同时期对比
- 各地区数据对比
- 风险类型对比
- 处理效率对比

#### 4. 热力图
**适用场景：**
- 时间段活跃度
- 地理位置分布
- 风险热点分析

#### 5. 仪表盘
**适用场景：**
- 实时风险评分
- 系统健康度
- 处理效率指标

## 具体内容设计

### 核心报表页面

#### 1. 风险监控大屏
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 风险监控总览 │
├─────────────────┬─────────────────┬─────────────────────────┤
│ 实时风险评分 │ 今日告警趋势 │ 风险类型分布 │
│ (仪表盘) │ (折线图) │ (饼图) │
├─────────────────┼─────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 地域风险热力图 │ 高风险交易排行 │
│ (热力图) │ (表格+柱状图) │
├─────────────────────────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 告警处理效率趋势 │ 风险预警指标 │
│ (面积图) │ (多个仪表盘) │
└─────────────────────────────────────┴─────────────────────────┘
```

#### 2. 业务分析报表
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 业务数据分析 │
├─────────────────┬─────────────────┬─────────────────────────┤
│ 交易量趋势 │ 交易金额趋势 │ 渠道使用分布 │
│ (折线图) │ (面积图) │ (环形图) │
├─────────────────┼─────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 时段活跃度分析 │ 用户行为分析 │
│ (热力图) │ (柱状图) │
├─────────────────────────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 地域交易分布 │ 异常交易统计 │
│ (地图+柱状图) │ (组合图表) │
└─────────────────────────────────────┴─────────────────────────┘
```

#### 3. 系统性能监控
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 系统性能监控 │
├─────────────────┬─────────────────┬─────────────────────────┤
│ CPU使用率趋势 │ 内存使用趋势 │ 网络流量监控 │
│ (折线图) │ (面积图) │ (双轴图) │
├─────────────────┼─────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 响应时间分析 │ 错误率统计 │
│ (折线图+散点图) │ (柱状图) │
├─────────────────────────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 数据库性能指标 │ 系统健康度评估 │
│ (多指标仪表盘) │ (综合仪表盘) │
└─────────────────────────────────────┴─────────────────────────┘
```

## ️ 技术实现方案

### 推荐图表库

#### 1. ECharts (推荐)
**优势：**
- 功能强大，图表类型丰富
- 性能优秀，支持大数据量
- 中文文档完善
- 银行业广泛使用

```bash
npm install echarts vue-echarts
```

#### 2. Chart.js
**优势：**
- 轻量级，易于使用
- 响应式设计
- 动画效果好

```bash
npm install chart.js vue-chartjs
```

#### 3. D3.js (高级定制)
**优势：**
- 最强大的可视化库
- 完全自定义
- 适合复杂图表

```bash
npm install d3
```

}

}

class ChartDataManager {
 private charts = new Map<string, any>()
 
 updateChart(chartId: string, data: any) {
 const chart = this.charts.get(chartId)
 if (chart) {
 chart.setOption(data, true)
 }
 }

 // WebSocket 订阅逻辑

}

## 用户体验设计

### 交互功能
1. **时间范围选择** - 支持快速切换不同时间段
2. **数据钻取** - 点击图表元素查看详细数据
3. **图表联动** - 多个图表之间的数据联动
4. **导出功能** - 支持导出图片和数据
5. **全屏显示** - 支持图表全屏查看

### 响应式设计
```css
/* 图表容器响应式 */
.chart-container {
 width: 100%;
 height: 400px;
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
 .chart-container {
 height: 300px;
 }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
 .chart-container {
 height: 250px;
 }
}
```

## 性能优化策略

### 1. 数据分页和虚拟化
```typescript
// 大数据量处理
const useChartPagination = (totalData: any[], pageSize = 1000) => {
 const currentPage = ref(0)
 const visibleData = computed(() => {
 const start = currentPage.value * pageSize
 return totalData.slice(start, start + pageSize)
 })
 
 return { currentPage, visibleData }
}
```

### 2. 图表懒加载
```typescript
// 图表懒加载
const useChartLazyLoad = () => {
 const chartRef = ref<HTMLElement>()
 const isVisible = ref(false)
 
 onMounted(() => {
 const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
 if (entries[0].isIntersecting) {
 isVisible.value = true
 observer.disconnect()
 }
 })
 
 if (chartRef.value) {
 observer.observe(chartRef.value)
 }
 })
 
 return { chartRef, isVisible }
}
```

这个数据可视化设计方案涵盖了银行告警监控系统的核心业务需求，提供了丰富的图表类型和交互功能。您觉得这个设计思路如何？需要我详细实现某个特定的图表或功能吗？

#### 2. 分布图表（饼图/环形图）
**适用场景：**
- 告警级别分布
- 地域交易分布
- 风险类型占比
- 渠道使用分布

#### 3. 对比图表（柱状图/条形图）
**适用场景：**
- 不同时期对比
- 各地区数据对比
- 风险类型对比
- 处理效率对比

#### 4. 热力图
**适用场景：**
- 时间段活跃度
- 地理位置分布
- 风险热点分析

#### 5. 仪表盘
**适用场景：**
- 实时风险评分
- 系统健康度
- 处理效率指标

## 具体内容设计

### 核心报表页面

#### 1. 风险监控大屏
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 风险监控总览 │
├─────────────────┬─────────────────┬─────────────────────────┤
│ 实时风险评分 │ 今日告警趋势 │ 风险类型分布 │
│ (仪表盘) │ (折线图) │ (饼图) │
├─────────────────┼─────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 地域风险热力图 │ 高风险交易排行 │
│ (热力图) │ (表格+柱状图) │
├─────────────────────────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 告警处理效率趋势 │ 风险预警指标 │
│ (面积图) │ (多个仪表盘) │
└─────────────────────────────────────┴─────────────────────────┘
```

#### 2. 业务分析报表
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 业务数据分析 │
├─────────────────┬─────────────────┬─────────────────────────┤
│ 交易量趋势 │ 交易金额趋势 │ 渠道使用分布 │
│ (折线图) │ (面积图) │ (环形图) │
├─────────────────┼─────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 时段活跃度分析 │ 用户行为分析 │
│ (热力图) │ (柱状图) │
├─────────────────────────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 地域交易分布 │ 异常交易统计 │
│ (地图+柱状图) │ (组合图表) │
└─────────────────────────────────────┴─────────────────────────┘
```

#### 3. 系统性能监控
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 系统性能监控 │
├─────────────────┬─────────────────┬─────────────────────────┤
│ CPU使用率趋势 │ 内存使用趋势 │ 网络流量监控 │
│ (折线图) │ (面积图) │ (双轴图) │
├─────────────────┼─────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 响应时间分析 │ 错误率统计 │
│ (折线图+散点图) │ (柱状图) │
├─────────────────────────────────────┼─────────────────────────┤
│ 数据库性能指标 │ 系统健康度评估 │
│ (多指标仪表盘) │ (综合仪表盘) │
└─────────────────────────────────────┴─────────────────────────┘
```

## ️ 技术实现方案

### 推荐图表库

#### 1. ECharts (推荐)
**优势：**
- 功能强大，图表类型丰富
- 性能优秀，支持大数据量
- 中文文档完善
- 银行业广泛使用

```bash
npm install echarts vue-echarts
```

#### 2. Chart.js
**优势：**
- 轻量级，易于使用
- 响应式设计
- 动画效果好

```bash
npm install chart.js vue-chartjs
```

#### 3. D3.js (高级定制)
**优势：**
- 最强大的可视化库
- 完全自定义
- 适合复杂图表

```bash
npm install d3
```

### UI组件设计

#### 报表页面布局组件
```vue
<!-- DataVisualization.vue -->
<template>
 <div class="data-visualization">
 <!-- 顶部导航 -->
 <div class="report-nav">
 <Tabs v-model="activeTab">
 <TabsList>
 <TabsTrigger value="risk">风险监控</TabsTrigger>
 <TabsTrigger value="business">业务分析</TabsTrigger>
 <TabsTrigger value="system">系统监控</TabsTrigger>
 <TabsTrigger value="custom">自定义报表</TabsTrigger>
 </TabsList>
 </Tabs>
 </div>

 <!-- 报表内容区域 -->

 </div>
 </div>

```

#### 图表容器组件
```vue
<!-- ChartContainer.vue -->
<template>
 <Card class="chart-container">

 <CardTitle class="flex items-center justify-between">
 <span>{{ title }}</span>
 <div class="chart-controls">
 <Select v-model="timeRange">
 <SelectTrigger class="w-32">
 <SelectValue placeholder="时间范围" />
 </SelectTrigger>
 <SelectContent>
 <SelectItem value="1h">近1小时</SelectItem>
 <SelectItem value="24h">近24小时</SelectItem>
 <SelectItem value="7d">近7天</SelectItem>
 <SelectItem value="30d">近30天</SelectItem>
 </SelectContent>
 </Select>
 <Button variant="outline" size="sm" @click="refreshData">
 <RefreshCw class="w-4 h-4" />
 </Button>
 </div>
 </CardTitle>
 </CardHeader>
 <CardContent>
 <div ref="chartRef" class="chart-wrapper" :style="{ height: chartHeight }"></div>
 </CardContent>
 </Card>
</template>
```

## 数据源设计

### 数据接口规范
```typescript
// 图表数据接口
interface ChartDataRequest {
 chartType: string
 timeRange: string
 filters?: Record<string, any>
 groupBy?: string[]
}

interface ChartDataResponse {
 code: number
 message: string
 data: {
 labels: string[]
 datasets: ChartDataset[]
 summary?: Record<string, number>
 }
}

interface ChartDataset {
 name: string
 data: number[]
 color?: string
 type?: string
}
```

### 实时数据更新
```typescript
// WebSocket 数据推送
interface RealtimeChartUpdate {
 chartId: string
 updateType: 'append' | 'replace' | 'update'
 data: any
 timestamp: number
}

// 图表数据管理
class ChartDataManager {
 private charts = new Map<string, any>()
 
 updateChart(chartId: string, data: any) {
 const chart = this.charts.get(chartId)
 if (chart) {
 chart.setOption(data, true)
 }
 }
 
 subscribeToUpdates(chartId: string) {
 // WebSocket 订阅逻辑
 }
}
```

## 用户体验设计

### 交互功能
1. **时间范围选择** - 支持快速切换不同时间段
2. **数据钻取** - 点击图表元素查看详细数据
3. **图表联动** - 多个图表之间的数据联动
4. **导出功能** - 支持导出图片和数据
5. **全屏显示** - 支持图表全屏查看

### 响应式设计
```css
/* 图表容器响应式 */
.chart-container {
 width: 100%;
 height: 400px;
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
 .chart-container {
 height: 300px;
 }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
 .chart-container {
 height: 250px;
 }
}
```

## 性能优化策略

### 1. 数据分页和虚拟化
```typescript
// 大数据量处理
const useChartPagination = (totalData: any[], pageSize = 1000) => {
 const currentPage = ref(0)
 const visibleData = computed(() => {
 const start = currentPage.value * pageSize
 return totalData.slice(start, start + pageSize)
 })
 
 return { currentPage, visibleData }
}
```

### 2. 图表懒加载
```typescript
// 图表懒加载
const useChartLazyLoad = () => {
 const chartRef = ref<HTMLElement>()
 const isVisible = ref(false)
 
 onMounted(() => {
 const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
 if (entries[0].isIntersecting) {
 isVisible.value = true
 observer.disconnect()
 }
 })
 
 if (chartRef.value) {
 observer.observe(chartRef.value)
 }
 })
 
 return { chartRef, isVisible }
}
```

这个数据可视化设计方案涵盖了银行告警监控系统的核心业务需求，提供了丰富的图表类型和交互功能。您觉得这个设计思路如何？需要我详细实现某个特定的图表或功能吗？

 7	import SheetTitle from '@/components/ui/sheet/SheetTitle.vue'

 9

 11	 inheritAttrs: false,
 12	})
 13

 15	 side: 'left',
 16	 variant: 'sidebar',
 17	 collapsible: 'offcanvas',
 18	})
 19	
 20	const { isMobile, state, openMobile, setOpenMobile } = useSidebar()
 21	</script>
 22

 24	 <div
 25	 v-if="collapsible === 'none'"

 28	 v-bind="$attrs"
 29	 >
 30	 <slot />
 31	 </div>
 32	
 33	 <Sheet v-else-if="isMobile" :open="openMobile" v-bind="$attrs" @update:open="setOpenMobile">
 34	 <SheetContent
 35	 data-sidebar="sidebar"
 36	 data-slot="sidebar"

 38	 :side="side"
 39	 class="bg-sidebar text-sidebar-foreground w-(--sidebar-width) p-0 [&>button]:hidden"

 42	 }"

 66	 'relative w-(--sidebar-width) bg-transparent transition-[width] duration-200 ease-linear',
 67	 'group-data-[collapsible=offcanvas]:w-0',

 84	 props.class,
 85	 )"
 86	 v-bind="$attrs"

 516	/**

 519	const getTrendColor = (trend: 'up' | 'down' | 'neutral') => {
 520	 switch (trend) {
 521	 case 'up':
 522	 return 'text-green-600'
 523	 case 'down':
 524	 return 'text-red-600'
 525	 default:
 526	 return 'text-gray-600'

 535	 case 'critical':
 536	 return 'destructive'
 537	 case 'warning':
 538	 return 'default'
 539	 case 'info':
 540	 return 'default'
 541	 default:
 542	 return 'default'
 543	 }
 544	}

 546	/**

 549	const getAlertIcon = (level: 'critical' | 'warning' | 'info') => {

 552	 return XCircle
 553	 case 'warning':
 554	 return AlertCircle
 555	 case 'info':
 556	 return CheckCircle
 557	 default:
 558	 return AlertCircle
 559	 }
 560	}

 562	/**

 568	 return 'text-red-500'
 569	 case 'warning':
 570	 return 'text-yellow-500'

 578	/**

 585	 case 'pending':
 586	 return 'secondary'
 587	 case 'failed':
 588	 return 'destructive'
 589	 default:

 610	/**

 615	 style: 'currency',
 616	 currency: 'CNY'
 617	 }).format(amount)
 618	}
 619	
 620	/**
 621	 * 格式化时间
 622	 */
 623	const formatTime = (date: Date) => {
 624	 const now = new Date()
 625	 const diff = now.getTime() - date.getTime()
 626	 const minutes = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60))
 627	
 628	 if (minutes < 1) return '刚刚'
 629	 if (minutes < 60) return `${minutes}分钟前`
 630	
 631	 const hours = Math.floor(minutes / 60)
 632	 if (hours < 24) return `${hours}小时前`
 633	
 634	 return date.toLocaleDateString('zh-CN')
 635	}

 285	import { ref, computed, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'

 303	// shadcn-vue 组件导入
 304	import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'
 305	import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'

 315	
 316	/**
 317	 * 银行告警系统数据接口定义
 318	 */
 319	interface KeyMetric {
 320	 id: string
 321	 title: string
 322	 value: string
 323	 change: string
 324	 trend: 'up' | 'down' | 'neutral'
 325	 icon: any
 326	 iconColor: string
 327	}
 328	
 329	interface AlertItem {
 330	 id: string
 331	 title: string
 332	 description: string
 333	 level: 'critical' | 'warning' | 'info'
 334	 timestamp: Date
 335	}
 336	
 337	interface TransactionItem {
 338	 id: string
 339	 account: string
 340	 amount: number
 341	 type: string
 342	 status: 'completed' | 'pending' | 'failed'
 343	 riskLevel: 'high' | 'medium' | 'low'
 344	 timestamp: Date
 345	}
 346	
 347	/**
 348	 * 系统状态管理
 349	 */
 350	const systemStatus = ref<'normal' | 'warning' | 'critical'>('normal')
 351	const isRefreshing = ref(false)
 352	
 353	const systemStatusText = computed(() => {
 354	 const statusMap = {
 355	 normal: '系统正常',
 356	 warning: '系统警告',
 357	 critical: '系统异常'
 358	 }
 359	 return statusMap[systemStatus.value]
 360	})
 361	
 362	/**
 363	 * 关键指标数据
 364	 */
 365	const keyMetrics = ref<KeyMetric[]>([
 366	 {
 367	 id: 'total-alerts',

 392	 },

 401	 }

 404	/**
 405	 * 实时告警数据
 406	 */
 407	const realtimeAlerts = ref<AlertItem[]>([
 408	 {
 409	 id: 'alert-1',

 411	 description: '账户 ****1234 发生单笔 500万 转账，超出日常交易阈值',
 412	 level: 'critical',

 671	const formatTime = (date: Date) => {
 672	 const now = new Date()
 673	 const diff = now.getTime() - date.getTime()
 674	 const minutes = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60))
 675	
 676	 if (minutes < 1) return '刚刚'
 677	 if (minutes < 60) return `${minutes}分钟前`
 678	
 679	 const hours = Math.floor(minutes / 60)
 680	 if (hours < 24) return `${hours}小时前`
 681	
 682	 return date.toLocaleDateString('zh-CN')
 683	}

 1	import { app, shell, BrowserWindow, ipcMain } from 'electron'
 2	import { join } from 'path'
 3	import { electronApp, optimizer, is } from '@electron-toolkit/utils'
 4	import icon from '../../resources/icon.png?asset'
 5	
 6	function createWindow(): void {
 7	 // Create the browser window.
 8	 const mainWindow = new BrowserWindow({
 9	 width: 900,
 10	 height: 670,
 11	 show: false,
 12	 autoHideMenuBar: true,
 13	 ...(process.platform === 'linux' ? { icon } : {}),
 14	 webPreferences: {
 15	 preload: join(__dirname, '../preload/index.js'),
 16	 sandbox: false
 17	 }
 18	 })
 19	
 20	 mainWindow.on('ready-to-show', () => {
 21	 mainWindow.show()
 22	 })
 23	
 24	 mainWindow.webContents.setWindowOpenHandler((details) => {
 25	 shell.openExternal(details.url)
 26	 return { action: 'deny' }
 27	 })
 28	
 29	 // HMR for renderer base on electron-vite cli.
 30	 // Load the remote URL for development or the local html file for production.
 31	 if (is.dev && process.env['ELECTRON_RENDERER_URL']) {
 32	 mainWindow.loadURL(process.env['ELECTRON_RENDERER_URL'])
 33	 } else {
 34	 mainWindow.loadFile(join(__dirname, '../renderer/index.html'))
 35	 }
 36	}
 37	
 38	// This method will be called when Electron has finished
 39	// initialization and is ready to create browser windows.
 40	// Some APIs can only be used after this event occurs.
 41	app.whenReady().then(() => {
 42	 // Set app user model id for windows
 43	 electronApp.setAppUserModelId('com.electron')
 44	
 45	 // Default open or close DevTools by F12 in development
 46	 // and ignore CommandOrControl + R in production.
 47	 // see https://github.com/alex8088/electron-toolkit/tree/master/packages/utils
 48	 app.on('browser-window-created', (_, window) => {
 49	 optimizer.watchWindowShortcuts(window)
 50	 })
 51	
 52	 // IPC test
 53	 ipcMain.on('ping', () => console.log('pong'))
 54	
 55	 createWindow()
 56	
 57	 app.on('activate', function () {
 58	 // On macOS it's common to re-create a window in the app when the
 59	 // dock icon is clicked and there are no other windows open.
 60	 if (BrowserWindow.getAllWindows().length === 0) createWindow()
 61	 })
 62	})
 63	
 64	// Quit when all windows are closed, except on macOS. There, it's common
 65	// for applications and their menu bar to stay active until the user quits
 66	// explicitly with Cmd + Q.
 67	app.on('window-all-closed', () => {
 68	 if (process.platform !== 'darwin') {
 69	 app.quit()
 70	 }
 71	})

 914	const startAlertAutoScroll = () => {
 915	 if (realtimeAlerts.value.length <= 2) return
 916	
 917	 alertScrollInterval = setInterval(() => {
 918	 currentAlertIndex.value++
 919	
 920	 // 当滚动到复制列表的开始位置时，无缝重置到原始列表
 921	 if (currentAlertIndex.value >= realtimeAlerts.value.length) {
 922	 // 先移除过渡动画
 923	 const container = alertContainer.value
 924	 if (container) {
 925	 container.style.transition = 'none'
 926	 currentAlertIndex.value = 0
 927	
 928	 // 强制重绘后恢复动画
 929	 setTimeout(() => {
 930	 container.style.transition = 'transform 1000ms ease-in-out'
 931	 }, 50)
 932	 }
 933	 }
 934	 }, 3000) // 每3秒滚动一次
 935	}
 936	
 937	/**

 939	 */
 940	const stopAlertAutoScroll = () => {
 941	 if (alertScrollInterval) {
 942	 clearInterval(alertScrollInterval)
 943	 }
 944	}

 946	/**

 948	 */
 949	const startRegionAutoScroll = () => {
 950	 if (regionStats.value.length <= 4) return // 如果城市数量少于等于4个，不需要滚动
 951	
 952	 isRegionScrolling.value = true
 953	 const itemHeight = 60 // 每个项目的高度（48px + 12px间距）
 954	 const totalHeight = regionStats.value.length * itemHeight
 955	
 956	 // 使用 requestAnimationFrame 实现平滑连续滚动
 957	 const scroll = () => {
 958	 if (!isRegionScrolling.value) return
 959	
 960	 // 每次移动 0.5px，实现平滑滚动
 961	 regionScrollOffset.value += 0.5
 962	
 963	 // 当滚动到原始列表的末尾时，无缝重置到开始位置
 964	 if (regionScrollOffset.value >= totalHeight) {
 965	 regionScrollOffset.value = 0
 966	 }
 967	
 968	 requestAnimationFrame(scroll)
 969	 }
 970	
 971	 // 开始滚动动画
 972	 requestAnimationFrame(scroll)
 973	}
 974	
 975	/**
 976	 * 停止地域分布自动滚动
 977	 */
 978	const stopRegionAutoScroll = () => {
 979	 isRegionScrolling.value = false
 980	 if (regionScrollInterval) {
 981	 clearInterval(regionScrollInterval)
 982	 }
 983	}
 984	
 985	/**

 987	 */
 988	let refreshInterval: NodeJS.Timeout
 989	
 990	onMounted(() => {

 995	 }

 1001	 // 启动地域分布自动滚动
 1002	 startRegionAutoScroll()
 1003	})
 1004	
 1005	onUnmounted(() => {
 1006	 if (refreshInterval) {
 1007	 clearInterval(refreshInterval)
 1008	 }
 1009	
 1010	 // 停止告警自动滚动
 1011	 stopAlertAutoScroll()
 1012

 16	### 开发环境
 17	```bash
 18	# 检查 Node.js 版本
 19	node --version # 应该 >= 16.0.0
 20	
 21	# 检查 npm 版本
 22	npm --version # 应该 >= 8.0.0
 23	
 24	# 检查 Git 版本
 25	git --version
 26	```
 27	
 28	## ️ 开发环境部署
 29	
 30	### 1. 克隆项目
 31	```bash
 32	git clone https://github.com/your-org/bank-monitoring-system.git
 33	cd bank-monitoring-system
 34	```
 35	
 36	### 2. 安装依赖
 37	```bash
 38	# 安装项目依赖
 39	npm install
 40	
 41	# 如果遇到网络问题，可以使用国内镜像
 42	npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com
 43	```
 44	
 45	### 3. 环境配置
 46	```bash
 47	# 复制环境配置文件
 48	cp .env.example .env.development
 49	
 50	# 编辑配置文件
 51	vim .env.development
 52	```
 53	
 54	**.env.development 示例:**
 55	```env
 56	# 应用配置
 57	NODE_ENV=development
 58	VITE_APP_TITLE=银行告警监控系统
 59	VITE_APP_VERSION=1.0.0
 60	
 61	# API 配置
 62	VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/api
 63	VITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:3000/ws
 64	
 65	# 功能开关
 66	VITE_ENABLE_MOCK=true
 67	VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=true
 68	VITE_ENABLE_HOT_RELOAD=true
 69	
 70	# 安全配置
 71	VITE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=your-encryption-key
 72	VITE_JWT_SECRET=your-jwt-secret
 73	```
 74	
 75	### 4. 启动开发服务器
 76	```bash
 77	# 启动开发模式
 78	npm run dev
 79	
 80	# 应用将在以下地址启动:
 81	# Renderer: http://localhost:5174
 82	# Electron: 自动启动桌面应用
 83	```
 84	
 85	### 5. 开发工具配置
 86	
 87	#### VSCode 配置
 88	创建 `.vscode/settings.json`:
 89	```json
 90	{
 91	 "typescript.preferences.importModuleSpecifier": "relative",
 92	 "editor.formatOnSave": true,
 93	 "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
 94	 "source.fixAll.eslint": true
 95	 },
 96	 "files.associations": {
 97	 "*.vue": "vue"
 98	 }
 99	}
 100	```
 101	
 102	#### ESLint 配置
 103	```json
 104	{
 105	 "extends": [
 106	 "@electron-toolkit/eslint-config-ts",
 107	 "@electron-toolkit/eslint-config-prettier"
 108	 ],
 109	 "rules": {
 110	 "@typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type": "off",
 111	 "vue/multi-word-component-names": "off"
 112	 }
 113	}
 114	```
 115	
 116	## 测试环境部署
 117	
 118	### 1. 构建测试版本
 119	```bash
 120	# 构建测试版本
 121	npm run build:test
 122	
 123	# 或者构建特定平台
 124	npm run build:win # Windows
 125	npm run build:mac # macOS
 126	npm run build:linux # Linux
 127	```
 128	
 129	### 2. 测试环境配置
 130	**.env.test 示例:**
 131	```env
 132	NODE_ENV=test
 133	VITE_API_BASE_URL=https://test-api.bank-monitor.com/api
 134	VITE_WS_URL=wss://test-api.bank-monitor.com/ws
 135	VITE_ENABLE_MOCK=false
 136	VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=true
 137	```
 138	
 139	### 3. 自动化测试
 140	```bash
 141	# 运行单元测试
 142	npm run test
 143	
 144	# 运行端到端测试
 145	npm run test:e2e
 146	
 147	# 生成测试覆盖率报告
 148	npm run test:coverage
 149	```
 150	
 151	### 4. 测试部署脚本
 152	```bash
 153	#!/bin/bash
 154	# deploy-test.sh
 155	
 156	echo "开始测试环境部署..."
 157	
 158	# 1. 拉取最新代码
 159	git pull origin develop
 160	
 161	# 2. 安装依赖
 162	npm ci
 163	
 164	# 3. 运行测试
 165	npm run test
 166	
 167	# 4. 构建应用
 168	npm run build:test
 169	
 170	# 5. 部署到测试服务器
 171	scp -r dist/* test-server:/opt/bank-monitor/
 172	
 173	echo "测试环境部署完成!"
 174	```
 175	
 176	## 生产环境部署
 177	
 178	### 1. 生产环境配置
 179	**.env.production 示例:**
 180	```env
 181	NODE_ENV=production
 182	VITE_API_BASE_URL=https://api.bank-monitor.com/api
 183	VITE_WS_URL=wss://api.bank-monitor.com/ws
 184	VITE_ENABLE_MOCK=false
 185	VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG=false
 186	VITE_ENABLE_HOT_RELOAD=false
 187	
 188	# 安全配置
 189	VITE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=production-encryption-key
 190	VITE_JWT_SECRET=production-jwt-secret
 191	```
 192	
 193	### 2. 构建生产版本
 194	```bash
 195	# 清理之前的构建
 196	npm run clean
 197	
 198	# 构建生产版本
 199	npm run build
 200	
 201	# 验证构建结果
 202	npm run build:check
 203	```
 204	
 205	### 3. 代码签名配置
 206	
 207	#### Windows 代码签名
 208	```json
 209	// package.json
 210	{
 211	 "build": {
 212	 "win": {
 213	 "certificateFile": "path/to/certificate.p12",
 214	 "certificatePassword": "certificate-password",
 215	 "signingHashAlgorithms": ["sha256"],
 216	 "signDlls": true
 217	 }
 218	 }
 219	}
 220	```
 221	
 222	#### macOS 代码签名
 223	```json
 224	// package.json
 225	{
 226	 "build": {
 227	 "mac": {
 228	 "identity": "Developer ID Application: Your Name",
 229	 "hardenedRuntime": true,
 230	 "entitlements": "build/entitlements.mac.plist",
 231	 "entitlementsInherit": "build/entitlements.mac.plist"
 232	 }
 233	 }
 234	}
 235	```
 236	
 237	### 4. 自动化部署
 238	
 239	#### GitHub Actions 配置
 240	```yaml
 241	# .github/workflows/deploy.yml
 242	name: Deploy Production
 243	
 244	on:
 245	 push:
 246	 tags:
 247	 - 'v*'
 248	
 249	jobs:
 250	 build-and-deploy:
 251	 runs-on: ubuntu-latest
 252	 
 253	 steps:
 254	 - uses: actions/checkout@v3
 255	 
 256	 - name: Setup Node.js
 257	 uses: actions/setup-node@v3
 258	 with:
 259	 node-version: '18'
 260	 cache: 'npm'
 261	 
 262	 - name: Install dependencies
 263	 run: npm ci
 264	 
 265	 - name: Run tests
 266	 run: npm run test
 267	 
 268	 - name: Build application
 269	 run: npm run build
 270	 env:
 271	 NODE_ENV: production
 272	 
 273	 - name: Upload artifacts
 274	 uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
 275	 with:
 276	 name: dist
 277	 path: dist/
 278	 
 279	 - name: Deploy to production
 280	 run: |
 281	 # 部署脚本
 282	 ./scripts/deploy-production.sh
 283	```
 284	
 285	#### 部署脚本
 286	```bash
 287	#!/bin/bash
 288	# scripts/deploy-production.sh
 289	
 290	set -e
 291	
 292	echo "开始生产环境部署..."
 293	
 294	# 1. 备份当前版本
 295	BACKUP_DIR="/opt/backups/bank-monitor-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)"
 296	mkdir -p $BACKUP_DIR
 297	cp -r /opt/bank-monitor/* $BACKUP_DIR/
 298	
 299	# 2. 停止当前服务
 300	systemctl stop bank-monitor
 301	
 302	# 3. 部署新版本
 303	rm -rf /opt/bank-monitor/*
 304	cp -r dist/* /opt/bank-monitor/
 305	
 306	# 4. 更新配置文件
 307	cp config/production.json /opt/bank-monitor/config/
 308	
 309	# 5. 设置权限
 310	chown -R bank-monitor:bank-monitor /opt/bank-monitor
 311	chmod +x /opt/bank-monitor/bank-monitor
 312	
 313	# 6. 启动服务
 314	systemctl start bank-monitor
 315	systemctl enable bank-monitor
 316	
 317	# 7. 健康检查
 318	sleep 10
 319	if systemctl is-active --quiet bank-monitor; then
 320	 echo "部署成功，服务正常运行"
 321	else
 322	 echo "部署失败，正在回滚..."
 323	 systemctl stop bank-monitor
 324	 rm -rf /opt/bank-monitor/*
 325	 cp -r $BACKUP_DIR/* /opt/bank-monitor/
 326	 systemctl start bank-monitor
 327	 exit 1
 328	fi
 329	
 330	echo "生产环境部署完成!"
 331	```
 332	
 333	## Docker 部署
 334	
 335	### 1. Dockerfile
 336	```dockerfile
 337	# Dockerfile
 338	FROM node:18-alpine AS builder
 339	
 340	WORKDIR /app
 341	COPY package*.json ./
 342	RUN npm ci --only=production
 343	
 344	COPY . .
 345	RUN npm run build
 346	
 347	FROM node:18-alpine AS runtime
 348	
 349	RUN apk add --no-cache \
 350	 chromium \
 351	 nss \
 352	 freetype \
 353	 freetype-dev \
 354	 harfbuzz \
 355	 ca-certificates \
 356	 ttf-freefont
 357	
 358	ENV PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true
 359	ENV PUPPETEER_EXECUTABLE_PATH=/usr/bin/chromium-browser
 360	
 361	WORKDIR /app
 362	COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
 363	COPY --from=builder /app/package*.json ./
 364	
 365	RUN npm ci --only=production
 366	
 367	EXPOSE 3000
 368	
 369	CMD ["npm", "start"]
 370	```
 371	
 372	### 2. Docker Compose
 373	```yaml
 374	# docker-compose.yml
 375	version: '3.8'
 376	
 377	services:
 378	 bank-monitor:
 379	 build: .
 380	 ports:
 381	 - "3000:3000"
 382	 environment:
 383	 - NODE_ENV=production
 384	 - API_BASE_URL=https://api.bank-monitor.com
 385	 volumes:
 386	 - ./config:/app/config
 387	 - ./logs:/app/logs
 388	 restart: unless-stopped
 389	 
 390	 nginx:
 391	 image: nginx:alpine
 392	 ports:
 393	 - "80:80"
 394	 - "443:443"
 395	 volumes:
 396	 - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf
 397	 - ./ssl:/etc/nginx/ssl
 398	 depends_on:
 399	 - bank-monitor
 400	 restart: unless-stopped
 401	```
 402	
 403	### 3. 构建和运行
 404	```bash
 405	# 构建镜像
 406	docker build -t bank-monitor:latest .
 407	
 408	# 运行容器
 409	docker run -d \
 410	 --name bank-monitor \
 411	 -p 3000:3000 \
 412	 -v $(pwd)/config:/app/config \
 413	 bank-monitor:latest
 414	
 415	# 使用 Docker Compose
 416	docker-compose up -d
 417	```
 418	
 419	## 系统服务配置
 420	
 421	### Linux Systemd 服务
 422	```ini
 423	# /etc/systemd/system/bank-monitor.service
 424	[Unit]
 425	Description=Bank Monitoring System
 426	After=network.target
 427	
 428	[Service]
 429	Type=simple
 430	User=bank-monitor
 431	WorkingDirectory=/opt/bank-monitor
 432	ExecStart=/opt/bank-monitor/bank-monitor
 433	Restart=always
 434	RestartSec=10
 435	Environment=NODE_ENV=production
 436	
 437	[Install]
 438	WantedBy=multi-user.target
 439	```
 440	
 441	```bash
 442	# 启用和启动服务
 443	sudo systemctl daemon-reload
 444	sudo systemctl enable bank-monitor
 445	sudo systemctl start bank-monitor
 446	
 447	# 查看服务状态
 448	sudo systemctl status bank-monitor
 449	
 450	# 查看日志
 451	sudo journalctl -u bank-monitor -f
 452	```
 453	
 454	### Windows 服务
 455	```xml
 456	<!-- bank-monitor-service.xml -->
 457	<service>
 458	 <id>BankMonitor</id>
 459	 <name>Bank Monitoring System</name>
 460	 <description>银行告警监控系统</description>
 461	 <executable>C:\Program Files\BankMonitor\bank-monitor.exe</executable>
 462	 <workingdirectory>C:\Program Files\BankMonitor</workingdirectory>
 463	 <logmode>rotate</logmode>
 464	</service>
 465	```

 467	## 监控和日志
 468	
 469	### 1. 应用监控
 470	```javascript
 471	// 性能监控
 472	const performanceMonitor = {
 473	 startTime: Date.now(),
 474	 
 475	 logMetrics: () => {
 476	 const metrics = {
 477	 uptime: process.uptime(),
 478	 memory: process.memoryUsage(),
 479	 cpu: process.cpuUsage(),
 480	 timestamp: Date.now()
 481	 }
 482	 
 483	 console.log('Performance metrics:', metrics)
 484	 }
 485	}
 486	
 487	setInterval(performanceMonitor.logMetrics, 60000) // 每分钟记录一次
 488	```
 489	
 490	### 2. 日志配置
 491	```javascript
 492	// 日志配置
 493	const winston = require('winston')
 494	
 495	const logger = winston.createLogger({
 496	 level: 'info',
 497	 format: winston.format.combine(
 498	 winston.format.timestamp(),
 499	 winston.format.errors({ stack: true }),
 500	 winston.format.json()
 501	 ),
 502	 transports: [
 503	 new winston.transports.File({ filename: 'logs/error.log', level: 'error' }),
 504	 new winston.transports.File({ filename: 'logs/combined.log' }),
 505	 new winston.transports.Console({
 506	 format: winston.format.simple()
 507	 })
 508	 ]
 509	})
 510	```
